holidays.title: National Computer Security Day
holidays.description: Cyber security affects everything from where we bank to who we elect to public office.

holidays.title: St. Andrew's Day
holidays.description: St Andrew’s Day ranks as one of three major dates during the winter period.

holidays.title: Barbados Independence Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the independence of one of the oldest British colonies on Barbados Independence Day.

holidays.title: Bonifacio Day
holidays.description: Take the time to celebrate the national holiday honoring the Father of the Philippine Revolution.

holidays.title: Choose Women Wednesday
holidays.description: Show your appreciation for the woman who can do everything on Choose Women Wednesday.

holidays.title: Cities for Life Day
holidays.description: Celebrate your human right to live, and the end of the inhumane act of the death penalty.

holidays.title: Day of Remembrance for all Victims of Chemical Warfare
holidays.description: This day honors those lost to chemical warfare and encourages people to continue protesting against it.

holidays.title: Guru Nanak Jayanti
holidays.description: It is one of the most sacred festivals in Sikhism.

holidays.title: National Mason Jar Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the holiday by trying an out-of-the-box craft with your mason jars.

holidays.title: National Methamphetamine Awareness Day
holidays.description: Spread the word and save a life or two from the fatal effects of this drug.

holidays.title: National Mississippi Day
holidays.description: National Mississippi day is a fun opportunity to celebrate the great state of Mississippi.

holidays.title: National Mousse Day
holidays.description: Put on your baker’s hat and surprise your loved ones with a glass of the fluffiest mousse.

holidays.title: National Personal Space Day
holidays.description: Change the way you show you care about people by learning about the importance of personal space.

holidays.title: National Stay at Home Because You're Well Day
holidays.description: You don’t need to call in sick or fake it; take a day off for being well.

holidays.title: Native Women's Equal Pay Day
holidays.description: Let’s learn more about Native Women’s Equal Pay Day and how to raise awareness.

holidays.title: Perpetual Youth Day
holidays.description: Rock and roll lives on, and this day makes sure the memory of Clark is long-lived.

holidays.title: Billy Idol’s Birthday
holidays.description: Billy Idol’s bad-boy persona is loved by rock music fans across the world.

holidays.title: Bo Jackson’s Birthday
holidays.description: He's a former professional baseball and American football player. Jackson does it all.

holidays.title: Cheyenne Evans’s Birthday
holidays.description: Cheyenne Evans exhibits all the beauty and talent an all-around star should have!

holidays.title: Chrissy Teigen’s Birthday
holidays.description: This stunning multi-talented celebrity is truly unique. Let's celebrate Chrissy Teigen’s birthday today!

holidays.title: Der Echter Gangster’s Birthday
holidays.description: Der Echter rose to fame after losing his temper while playing "Unreal Tournament."

holidays.title: Emily Skinner’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this bright young lady who aspired to be an actress and achieved her goal.

holidays.title: Hannah Bagshawe’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this business executive who is the wife/publicist of actor Eddie Redmayne.

holidays.title: Ian Hecox’s Birthday
holidays.description: We are honoring Ian Hecox, one of YouTube's oldest and most influential creators.

holidays.title: Jill Zarin’s Birthday
holidays.description: Meet everyone’s favorite contestant from “The Real Housewives of New York City,” Jill Zarin.

holidays.title: Jorge Garay’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jorge Garay, the TikTok sensation who is taking over the internet, has an interesting back story.

holidays.title: Kaley Cuoco’s Birthday
holidays.description: She started out as a tennis player but later discovered she wanted to act instead.

holidays.title: Mandy Patinkin’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-award-winning screen and stage actor is also a singer and activist rolled into one.

holidays.title: Mark Twain’s Birthday
holidays.description: Mark Twain is one of the greatest American authors of the 19th and 20th centuries.

holidays.title: Nyjah Huston’s Birthday
holidays.description: Huston is one of the wealthiest skateboarders, with more prizes than any other skateboarder in history.

holidays.title: Pigeon John’s Birthday
holidays.description: Pigeon John picked his stage name with the help of his friend’s mother.

holidays.title: Rianna Pepe’s Birthday
holidays.description: Rianna Pepe is a popular dancer who has performed at the Broadway Dance Center.

holidays.title: Stephanie Carrillo’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Columbian journalist is truly loved by people and for all good reasons!

holidays.title: Steve Aoki’s Birthday
holidays.description: Meet Steve Aoki, the world-renowned D.J. with an unexpected journey to stardom.

holidays.title: Trill Sammy’s Birthday
holidays.description: Garcia began his career as a high school student using social media to promote himself.

holidays.title: Winston Churchill’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s among the most well-known soldier turned statesman and we’re excited to share his remarkable journey.

holidays.title: Woody Allen’s Birthday
holidays.description: Here is the iconic film director, writer, actor, and comedian who’s as talented as he’s versatile!
